allow:
Bash(powershell -Command "
$script = @''
import os, decimal

filepath = os.path.join\(chr\(67\)+chr\(58\), os.sep + chr\(85\)+''sers'', ''khleu'', ''ThriftHammer'', ''Thrifthammer'', ''products'', ''management'', ''commands'', ''populate_products.py''\)
with open\(filepath, chr\(114\), encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    content = f.read\(\)

NL = chr\(10\)
SP = chr\(32\)
Q  = chr\(39\)
D  = chr\(34\)

def blk\(*lines\):
    return NL.join\(lines\)

# CHANGE 3
old_boxed = blk\(
    SP*12 + ''# ---- Boxed Games ----'',
    SP*12 + ''\('',
    SP*16 + Q+''Leviathan \(10th Edition Starter Set\)''+Q+'','',
    SP*16 + Q+''Boxed Games''+Q+'', None,'',
    SP*16 + Q+''40-02''+Q+'', decimal.Decimal\(''+Q+''145.00''+Q+''\),'',
    SP*16 + Q+''The huge 10th Edition launch box. Contains Space Marine ''+Q,
    SP*16 + Q+''and Tyranid forces, a 376-page hardback rulebook, dice, ''+Q,
    SP*16 + Q+''and terrain. Superb value.''+Q+'','',
    SP*12 + ''\),'',
    SP*12 + ''\('',
    SP*16 + Q+''Warhammer 40,000 Starter Set''+Q+'','',
    SP*16 + Q+''Boxed Games''+Q+'', None,'',
    SP*16 + Q+''40-03''+Q+'', decimal.Decimal\(''+Q+''50.00''+Q+''\),'',
    SP*16 + Q+''A compact starter with push-fit Space Marines and Tyranids, ''+Q,
    SP*16 + Q+''a small rulebook, and all you need to play your first game.''+Q+'','',
    SP*12 + ''\),'',
    SP*12 + ''\('',
    SP*16 + Q+''Combat Patrol: Space Marines''+Q+'','',
    SP*16 + Q+''Boxed Games''+Q+'', ''+Q+''Space Marines''+Q+'','',
    SP*16 + Q+''71-02''+Q+'', decimal.Decimal\(''+Q+''105.00''+Q+''\),'',
    SP*16 + Q+''A ready-to-play Combat Patrol force of Space Marines: ''+Q,
    SP*16 + Q+''Captain, Redemptor Dreadnought, Intercessors, and Outriders.''+Q+'','',
    SP*12 + ''\),'',
    SP*12 + ''\('',
    SP*16 + Q+''Age of Sigmar Warrior Starter Set''+Q+'','',
    SP*16 + Q+''Boxed Games''+Q+'', None,'',
    SP*16 + Q+''80-15''+Q+'', decimal.Decimal\(''+Q+''35.00''+Q+''\),'',
    SP*16 + Q+''The perfect introduction to Age of Sigmar: Stormcast Eternals ''+Q,
    SP*16 + Q+''vs Kruleboyz Orks, with a Getting Started guide.''+Q+'','',
    SP*12 + ''\),'',
    SP*12 + ''\('',
    SP*16 + Q+''Horus Heresy: Age of Darkness''+Q+'','',
    SP*16 + Q+''Boxed Games''+Q+'', None,'',
    SP*16 + Q+''HH-001''+Q+'', decimal.Decimal\(''+Q+''180.00''+Q+''\),'',
    SP*16 + Q+''The massive Horus Heresy launch box. 54 plastic Mk VI Space ''+Q,
    SP*16 + Q+''Marines, vehicles, and the complete rulebook.''+Q+'','',
    SP*12 + ''\),'',
    SP*12 + ''\('',
    SP*16 + Q+''Warcry: Red Harvest''+Q+'','',
    SP*16 + Q+''Boxed Games''+Q+'', None,'',
    SP*16 + Q+''WC-001''+Q+'', decimal.Decimal\(''+Q+''105.00''+Q+''\),'',
    SP*16 + Q+''A two-player Warcry skirmish set with two rival warbands, ''+Q,
    SP*16 + Q+''modular terrain, and complete rules.''+Q+'','',
    SP*12 + ''\),'',
    SP*12 + ''\('',
    SP*16 + Q+''Necromunda: Hive War''+Q+'','',
    SP*16 + Q+''Boxed Games''+Q+'', None,'',
    SP*16 + Q+''NM-001''+Q+'', decimal.Decimal\(''+Q+''80.00''+Q+''\),'',
    SP*16 + Q+''The Necromunda two-player gang warfare set with Escher and ''+Q,
    SP*16 + Q+''Delaque gangs, plus terrain and rules.''+Q+'','',
    SP*12 + ''\),'',
    SP*12 + ''\('',
    SP*16 + Q+''Kill Team: Nightmare''+Q+'','',
    SP*16 + Q+''Boxed Games''+Q+'', None,'',
    SP*16 + Q+''KT-001''+Q+'', decimal.Decimal\(''+Q+''130.00''+Q+''\),'',
    SP*16 + Q+''A Kill Team box with Chaos Legionaries vs Wyrmblade Genestealer ''+Q,
    SP*16 + Q+''Cult operatives, terrain, and full Kill Team rules.''+Q+'','',
    SP*12 + ''\),'',
\)

new_boxed = blk\(
    SP*12 + ''# ---- Starter Sets \(40K\) ----'',
    SP*12 + ''\('',
    SP*16 + Q+''Leviathan \(10th Edition Starter Set\)''+Q+'','',
    SP*16 + Q+''Warhammer 40,000''+Q+'', None,'',
    SP*16 + Q+''40-02''+Q+'', decimal.Decimal\(''+Q+''145.00''+Q+''\),'',
    SP*16 + Q+''The huge 10th Edition launch box. Contains Space Marine ''+Q,
    SP*16 + Q+''and Tyranid forces, a 376-page hardback rulebook, dice, ''+Q,
    SP*16 + Q+''and terrain. Superb value.''+Q+'','',
    SP*12 + ''\),'',
    SP*12 + ''\('',
    SP*16 + Q+''Warhammer 40,000 Starter Set''+Q+'','',
    SP*16 + Q+''Warhammer 40,000''+Q+'', None,'',
    SP*16 + Q+''40-03''+Q+'', decimal.Decimal\(''+Q+''50.00''+Q+''\),'',
    SP*16 + Q+''A compact starter with push-fit Space Marines and Tyranids, ''+Q,
    SP*16 + Q+''a small rulebook, and all you need to play your first game.''+Q+'','',
    SP*12 + ''\),'',
    SP*12 + ''\('',
    SP*16 + Q+''Combat Patrol: Space Marines''+Q+'','',
    SP*16 + Q+''Warhammer 40,000''+Q+'', ''+Q+''Space Marines''+Q+'','',
    SP*16 + Q+''71-02''+Q+'', decimal.Decimal\(''+Q+''105.00''+Q+''\),'',
    SP*16 + Q+''A ready-to-play Combat Patrol force of Space Marines: ''+Q,
    SP*16 + Q+''Captain, Redemptor Dreadnought, Intercessors, and Outriders.''+Q+'','',
    SP*12 + ''\),'',
    SP*12 + ''# ---- Starter Sets \(AoS\) ----'',
    SP*12 + ''\('',
    SP*16 + Q+''Age of Sigmar Warrior Starter Set''+Q+'','',
    SP*16 + Q+''Age of Sigmar''+Q+'', None,'',
    SP*16 + Q+''80-15''+Q+'', decimal.Decimal\(''+Q+''35.00''+Q+''\),'',
    SP*16 + Q+''The perfect introduction to Age of Sigmar: Stormcast Eternals ''+Q,
    SP*16 + Q+''vs Kruleboyz Orks, with a Getting Started guide.''+Q+'','',
    SP*12 + ''\),'',
    SP*12 + ''# ---- Horus Heresy Starter ----'',
    SP*12 + ''\('',
    SP*16 + Q+''Horus Heresy: Age of Darkness''+Q+'','',
    SP*16 + Q+''Horus Heresy''+Q+'', None,'',
    SP*16 + Q+''HH-001''+Q+'', decimal.Decimal\(''+Q+''180.00''+Q+''\),'',
    SP*16 + Q+''The massive Horus Heresy launch box. 54 plastic Mk VI Space ''+Q,
    SP*16 + Q+''Marines, vehicles, and the complete rulebook.''+Q+'','',
    SP*12 + ''\),'',
    SP*12 + ''# ---- Kill Team ----'',
    SP*12 + ''\('',
    SP*16 + Q+''Kill Team: Nightmare''+Q+'','',
    SP*16 + Q+''Kill Team''+Q+'', None,'',
    SP*16 + Q+''KT-001''+Q+'', decimal.Decimal\(''+Q+''130.00''+Q+''\),'',
    SP*16 + Q+''A Kill Team box with Chaos Legionaries vs Wyrmblade Genestealer ''+Q,
    SP*16 + Q+''Cult operatives, terrain, and full Kill Team rules.''+Q+'','',
    SP*12 + ''\),'',
    SP*12 + ''\('',
    SP*16 + Q+''Kill Team: Into the Dark''+Q+'','',
    SP*16 + Q+''Kill Team''+Q+'', None,'',
    SP*16 + Q+''KT-002''+Q+'', decimal.Decimal\(''+Q+''130.00''+Q+''\),'',
    SP*16 + Q+''A Kill Team box set featuring Veteran Guardsmen vs Intercession ''+Q,
    SP*16 + Q+''Squad operatives with a space hulk terrain board.''+Q+'','',
    SP*12 + ''\),'',
    SP*12 + ''\('',
    SP*16 + Q+''Kill Team: Starter Set''+Q+'','',
    SP*16 + Q+''Kill Team''+Q+'', None,'',
    SP*16 + Q+''KT-003''+Q+'', decimal.Decimal\(''+Q+''65.00''+Q+''\),'',
    SP*16 + Q+''The essential Kill Team starter box with two warbands, terrain, ''+Q,
    SP*16 + Q+''tokens, dice, and the complete condensed rules.''+Q+'','',
    SP*12 + ''\),'',
\)

if old_boxed in content:
    content = content.replace\(old_boxed, new_boxed\)
    print\(''CHANGE 3: OK - Products redistributed to proper categories''\)
else:
    print\(''CHANGE 3: FAILED''\)
    # debug
    idx = content.find\(Q+''Boxed Games''+Q+'', None,''\)
    print\(''Boxed Games still in file at index:'', idx\)

with open\(filepath, ''w'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    f.write\(content\)
print\(''Saved.''\)
''@
Set-Content -Path ''C:/Users/khleu/ThriftHammer/patch3.py'' -Value $script -Encoding UTF8
python C:/Users/khleu/ThriftHammer/patch3.py
")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "
# Write gen_c5.py in parts using Add-Content
# First create the file with the header
Set-Content ''C:/Users/khleu/ThriftHammer/gen_c5.py'' -Value ''import os'' -Encoding UTF8
Add-Content ''C:/Users/khleu/ThriftHammer/gen_c5.py'' -Value ''''
Add-Content ''C:/Users/khleu/ThriftHammer/gen_c5.py'' -Value ''fp = os.path.join\(chr\(67\)+chr\(58\), os.sep+chr\(85\)+chr\(115\)+chr\(101\)+chr\(114\)+chr\(115\), chr\(107\)+chr\(104\)+chr\(108\)+chr\(101\)+chr\(117\), chr\(84\)+chr\(104\)+chr\(114\)+chr\(105\)+chr\(102\)+chr\(116\)+chr\(72\)+chr\(97\)+chr\(109\)+chr\(109\)+chr\(101\)+chr\(114\), chr\(84\)+chr\(104\)+chr\(114\)+chr\(105\)+chr\(102\)+chr\(116\)+chr\(104\)+chr\(97\)+chr\(109\)+chr\(109\)+chr\(101\)+chr\(114\), chr\(112\)+chr\(114\)+chr\(111\)+chr\(100\)+chr\(117\)+chr\(99\)+chr\(116\)+chr\(115\), chr\(109\)+chr\(97\)+chr\(110\)+chr\(97\)+chr\(103\)+chr\(101\)+chr\(109\)+chr\(101\)+chr\(110\)+chr\(116\), chr\(99\)+chr\(111\)+chr\(109\)+chr\(109\)+chr\(97\)+chr\(110\)+chr\(100\)+chr\(115\), chr\(112\)+chr\(111\)+chr\(112\)+chr\(117\)+chr\(108\)+chr\(97\)+chr\(116\)+chr\(101\)+chr\(95\)+chr\(112\)+chr\(114\)+chr\(111\)+chr\(100\)+chr\(117\)+chr\(99\)+chr\(116\)+chr\(115\)+chr\(46\)+chr\(112\)+chr\(121\)\)''
Add-Content ''C:/Users/khleu/ThriftHammer/gen_c5.py'' -Value ''with open\(fp, chr\(114\), encoding=chr\(117\)+chr\(116\)+chr\(102\)+chr\(45\)+chr\(56\)\) as f:''
Add-Content ''C:/Users/khleu/ThriftHammer/gen_c5.py'' -Value ''    c = f.read\(\)''
Add-Content ''C:/Users/khleu/ThriftHammer/gen_c5.py'' -Value ''print\(chr\(76\)+chr\(105\)+chr\(110\)+chr\(101\)+chr\(115\)+chr\(58\), len\(c.splitlines\(\)\)\)''
python ''C:/Users/khleu/ThriftHammer/gen_c5.py''
")
